casebody.data:
PRINTING SERVICES
v.
AM. CAPITAL GROUP. No. 599A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 26, 2007. Lynanne B. Wescott, Philadelphia, PA, for American Capital Group, Inc. Stephen E. Robertson, Greensboro, for Printing Services of Greensboro. Gary R. Govert, Special Deputy Attorney General, M. Lynne Weaver, Philip A. Lehman, Assistant Attorney Generals, for Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of February 2007 by Attorney General for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of February 2007."
